title: End game lobby takes 20-30 seconds to load?
body: A couple of patches ago, I started encountering a problem where I have to wait 20-30 seconds for my client to load after games (as opposed to loading near instantly). Wondering if anyone has encountered the same problem or has a fix for said problem.

replies.body: You should be able to see post game lobbies much quicker by turning off **close client during game** in the client options. Let me know if that makes things transition a little faster!
This fixed it, thank you very much!
